section.title: calendars printing for sales analysis Print S/A Special Calendar Form
section.para: To print a Sales Analysis special Calendar Form, select the "Print S/A Special Calendar Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Sales Analysis special Calendar Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select the Calendar you want to use for the report.
Specify the Calendar Form you want to print.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
